thread.title: Hollywood actor Josh Duhamel helping North Dakota tourism
thread.title_full: Hollywood actor Josh Duhamel helping North Dakota tourism

title: Hollywood actor Josh Duhamel helping North Dakota tourism
text:
Hollywood actor and Minot native Josh Duhamel shoots video for North Dakota tourism 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 8/17/15 10:07 am EDT - Updated: 8/17/15 10:10 am EDT 
FARGO, North Dakota â€” Hollywood actor Josh Duhamel was back in his native state over the weekend shooting a North Dakota tourism video. 
WDAY-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1IWYiTT ) that the Minot native was in Fargo on Sunday night, shooting part of the video outside the historic Fargo Theater. Cheerleaders from North Dakota State University and the University of North Dakota also were part of the shoot. 
State tourism officials say the promotional campaign will be rolled out early next year. 
Duhamel is perhaps best known for his work in the "Transformers" movies. 
Information from: WDAY-TV, http://wday.com
